name: Mike
tagline: Introducing the MIKE stack - Mongo, io.js, KendoUI and Express
body:
### Welcome to the Mike-Stack.com.
This site is a home page for a proof of concept, which is using Mongodb, Io.js, Kendo UI, and Express to create a web app. The full explanation of Mike can be found in this slide deck:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
